title: Introduction to finna
text: Fuzzy search also yield results feature words similar search term. search operator ~ perform fuzzy search used final character single-word search. example, fuzzy search word roam also return results words foam roams.
code: fuzzy_search <- search_finna("roam~") ## No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. print(fuzzy_search) ## NULL

title: Check access to https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi — check_api_access
text: Check R access resources https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi. function tests whether R can successfully connect Finna API attempting download API's OpenAPI specification.

title: Check access to https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi — check_api_access
code: check_api_access()

title: Check access to https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi — check_api_access
text: logical indicating API accessible (TRUE) (FALSE).

title: Check access to https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi — check_api_access
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   # Check if the API is accessible   access <- check_api_access()   if (access) {     message("Finna API is accessible")   } else {     message("Finna API is not accessible")   } } # }

what: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: function retrieves multiple Finna records based vector record IDs. can specify fields return, language, pagination options.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: get_finna_records(   ids,   field = NULL,   prettyPrint = FALSE,   lng = "fi",   page = 1,   limit = 100 )

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: ids vector record IDs retrieve. field vector fields return. Defaults NULL, returns default fields. prettyPrint Logical; whether pretty-print response. Defaults FALSE. lng Language returned translated strings. Defaults "fi". page page number retrieve. Defaults 1. limit number records return per page. Defaults 20.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: tibble containing retrieved records data provenance information.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: records <- get_finna_records("fikka.3405646", field = "title", prettyPrint = TRUE, lng = "en-gb") print(records) #> # A tibble: 1 × 10 #>   Title         Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series provenance #>   <chr>         <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr>      #> 1 Uimaveden pu… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA     Finna API… #> # ℹ 1 more variable: data_license <chr>

code: library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’ #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’: #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union finna_data <- search_finna("sibelius")  # Example other dataset to merge with other_data <- tibble::tibble(   Title = c("Sibelius Symphony No. 5", "Finlandia", "Valse Triste"),   Rating = c(5, 4, 3) )  # Integrate the two datasets by "Title" integrated_data <- integrate_metadata(finna_data, other_data, key = "Title") print(integrated_data) #> # A tibble: 103 × 9 #>    Title            Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series Rating #>    <chr>            <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>   <dbl> #>  1 Sibelius favour… Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA         NA #>  2 Sibelius         Tappe… 1967  NA       Taidet… NA       Jyväsk… NA         NA #>  3 Sibelius         Favén… NA    NA       Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… NA         NA #>  4 Sibelius         Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… NA         NA #>  5 Sibelius         Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Eepos-… NA         NA #>  6 SIBELIUS         TÖRNE… 1945  fin      Kirja,… SIBELIU… Helle-… NA         NA #>  7 Sibelius         Lampi… 1995  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA         NA #>  8 Sibelius         Lampi… 2005  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA         NA #>  9 Sibelius         Lampi… 1984  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA         NA #> 10 Sibelius         Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA         NA #> # ℹ 93 more rows

what: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: function retrieves records Finna index option limit total number records returned. function paginates results, fetching records specified total limit reached.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
code: search_finna(   query = NULL,   type = "AllFields",   fields = NULL,   filters = NULL,   facets = NULL,   facetFilters = NULL,   sort = "relevance,id asc",   limit = 100,   lng = "fi",   prettyPrint = FALSE )

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: query description type string specifying type search. Options include "AllFields", "Title", "Author", "Subject". Defaults "AllFields". fields vector fields returned search results. Defaults NULL, returns standard set fields. filters vector filter queries refine search. Defaults NULL. facets vector specifying facets return results. Defaults NULL. facetFilters vector regular expressions filter facets. Defaults NULL. sort string defining sort order results. Options include: "relevance,id asc" (default) "main_date_str desc" (Year, newest first) "main_date_str asc" (Year, oldest first) "last_indexed desc" (Last modified) "first_indexed desc" (Last added) "callnumber,id asc" (Classmark) "author,id asc" (Author) "title,id asc" (Title) limit integer specifying total number records return across multiple pages. lng string language returned translated strings. Options "fi", "en-gb", "sv", "se". Defaults "fi". prettyPrint logical value indicating whether pretty-print JSON response. Useful debugging. Defaults FALSE.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: tibble containing search results relevant fields extracted provenance information.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
code: search_results <- search_finna("sibelius", sort = "main_date_str desc", limit = 100) print(search_results) #> # A tibble: 100 × 8 #>    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series #>    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  #>  1 He selvisivät sodasta   Kirve… 2024  fin      Kirja,… sotilaa… Anders… NA     #>  2 Yli-ihmisiä ja traagis… Frost… 2024  fin      Kirja,… Wagner,… Helka-… NA     #>  3 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  fin      Kirja,… Järnefe… Anders… Atene… #>  4 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  swe      Kirja,… Järnefe… Helle-… Atene… #>  5 Eero Järnefelt          Järne… 2024  eng      Kirja,… Järnefe… Helmet… Atene… #>  6 Solace                  NA     2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Anders… NA     #>  7 Laulun juhlaa           Klas,… 2024  fin      Äänite… 2020-lu… Helmet… NA     #>  8 Solace                  Sibel… 2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Taidey… NA     #>  9 A gardener's world : f… Fishe… 2024  eng      Äänite… NA       Anders… NA     #> 10 Sibelius, Prokofiev 1,… Janse… 2024  zxx      Äänite… NA       Eepos-… NA     #> # ℹ 90 more rows
